thread.title: Kinetic theTechnologyAgency Honored on Business First Fast 50 List for Fourth Consecutive Year
thread.title_full: Kinetic theTechnologyAgency Honored on Business First Fast 50 List for Fourth Consecutive Year

author: Andrew Aikens
title: Kinetic theTechnologyAgency Honored on Business First Fast 50 List for Fourth Consecutive Year
text:
Kinetic theTechnologyAgency, a global leader in translation management systems and services, announced Friday that it was recognized on the 2015 Business First Fast 50 list as the 34th fastest-growing company in the Louisville area. The annual list, in its 16th year in publication, recognizes 50 independent, private, for-profit Louisville-area businesses that have a minimum of $1 million in revenue in the recent three-year period, along with a three-year operating sales history. The list contains companies from all sectors, in one diverse group of Louisville-area businesses that have grown substantially, created jobs, and strengthened the local economy.
Kinetic made its first appearance on the list in 2012, ranking 23rd. In 2013, Kinetic moved up to 5th on the list, due to a 675% increase of international sales in 2012. Last year’s list included Kinetic at number 41.
“Special thanks to Business First Louisville and all of our fantastic clients. By continuously improving our products and services, we help our clients continuously improve their products and services,” said Ray Schuhmann, President and CEO of Kinetic theTechnologyAgency.
Kinetic’s newest employee, Steve Ragan, Chief Relationship Officer, is now tasked with expanding Kinetic’s presence locally and globally.
“Kinetic has a tremendous amount of potential in the global translation industry. Key initiatives for 2015 include refining the brand, adapting the service and tool to a larger market, creating inbound marketing strategies and diversifying and growing the base. 2016 will be a big year for Kinetic,” said Steve Ragan, Chief Relationship Officer at Kinetic theTechnologyAgency
Kinetic’s Globalizor™ software has processed more than 15,000 translation projects, facilitating the translation of more than 250 million words in more than 40 languages. To fulfill the needs of clients across the globe, Kinetic added five full-time employees in 2015.
About Kinetic theTechnologyAgency
Kinetic theTechnologyAgency provides the world’s only true globalization platform working exclusively on the translation buyer’s behalf to significantly reduce translation expense, while improving translation quality and accelerating time to global markets. Kinetic’s proprietary technologies provide an integrated system for content and translation management, publishing, personalization and delivery to generate global sales revenue faster while simultaneously reducing the complexity and expense of going international.
